description: Roof extension to rear (main) roof slope incorporating a Juliet balcony; part rear roof extension to rear outrigger roof slope and installation of two roof lights to front roof slope; Alterations to the first floor rear elevation.
decision_conditions: The development permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.
REASON: In order to comply with the provisions of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 (As Amended).

| The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with the drawing/plan titles: Location Plan (ref. #00508054-A9E508); Proposed Ground Floor Plan (ref. 70-P02 Rev B); Proposed First Floor Plan (ref. 70-P03 Rev A); Proposed Loft Plan (ref. 70-P04 Rev A); Proposed Front and Rear Elevation (ref. 70-PS06 Rev A); Proposed Side Elevation (ref. 70-P07 Rev A); Proposed Section AA (ref. 70-P08 Rev B)
REASON: For avoidance of doubt and in the interest of proper planning.

| All external materials to be used in the development shall match the appearance of those of the existing dwellinghouse and shall be consistent with those as listed within the submitted application form and the drawings / plans as listed in Condition 2.

REASON: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the existing building and surrounding area in accordance with the Acton Green Conservation Area Management Plan (2008) and policies 7.4, 7.6 and 7.8 of the London Plan (2016); 1.1 and 1.2 of the Local Development Framework (Core) Strategy (2012); and 7B, 7C and 7.4 of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan (2013)
